data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Zhob to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 27 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Zhob.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Baloch Mari people might believe through him.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Zhob a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan has a population of 350,000.

We estimate Zhob has 976 people who might know Jesus, 3,500 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 345,524 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Zhob, Baluchistan, Pakistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
